title: Power Surge by Julie Dillon
author: Julie Dillon
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Power Surge by Julie Dillon

Issue 113 – February 2016Cover ArtPower SurgeJulie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
